title: where did those club/ public chatting stuff go?
body: I got a cancer while finding them

replies.body:
Clubs chat is right on the top of the persistent social panel on the right side of the Beta Client. It's similarly located on the right side of the Legacy Client. Public chat didn't make it to the Beta Client yet, but if's in the Legacy Client with your clubs.

Are you seeing any PvP.net connection error messages?
